title: The Original Jhin Concept!
body:
So, I was looking through old forum posts when searching for possible clues as to what Jihn will be when he is released. I came across this link: http://forums.na.leagueoflegends.com/board/showthread.php?t=769230

Reminds me of the Dha Ma concept relating to Kindred :D I haven't seen this spread to other big threads yet so yeah :D Here is it!{{summoner:31}}
